task: Search for a popular Pasta Sauce with more than 1000 reviews and a rating above 4 stars. Create a shopping list of ingredients for this recipe.
observation: The latest observations reflect that the user successfully located the "World's Best Pasta Sauce!" recipe on Allrecipes. This recipe meets the specified criteria, having over 1,078 ratings and a high rating of 4.8 stars. The page provides detailed information including the prep time of 15 minutes, a cook time of 1 hour 40 minutes, and serves 16. The comprehensive list of ingredients includes: 1 pound sweet Italian sausage, 3/4 pound lean ground beef, 1/2 cup minced onion, 2 cloves of garlic crushed, 1 (28 ounce) can crushed tomatoes, 2 (6.5 ounce) cans tomato sauce, 2 (6 ounce) cans tomato paste, 1/2 cup water, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1 1/2 teaspoons dried basil, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, 1/2 teaspoon fennel seed, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper.
